title: Ep. 18 You's A Hoe
description:
This week the ladies dive deep into what a hoe is and if it's actually a bad thing. Medinah and Shayla Raye have similar ideas about what makes someone a hoe, while Kiki has a very different idea.

Remember to check out our sponsors!

Sign up to run the Atlanta Mission's 5k with us or just donate! Just search for the CockTales Podcast team at race.atlantamission.org

Be sure to follow Kiki on instagram @KikiSaidSo to find out where you can purchase your R&B Night tickets
